sense.def:
An entry
je nekaj, kar storimo, da bi sodelovali na tekmovanju, na primer opravimo delo ali odgovorimo na vrsto vprašanj.

Tisto, kar je zapisano pod določenim naslovom v dnevniku, računovodski knjigi, slovarju ali enciklopediji, se prav tako imenuje
an entry
.

seg.quote: Let me look up the entries for mid-June.

sense.def:
An entry
je tudi pot v neki prostor, na primer vrata.

seg.quote: ...the pretty screen at the entry to Hyde Park.

sense.def:
A person's entry
je prihod osebe v sobo.

seg.quote: At Derek's entry a few heads turned.

sense.def:
To be allowed entry into a country or place
pomeni imeti dovoljenje, da vstopimo v državo ali prostor.

seg.quote: Many of his associates were refused entry to Britain.

sense.def:
One's entry into a society or group
je pridružitev nekoga neki družbi ali skupini.

Entry in a competition
je sodelovanje na tekmovanju.

seg.quote: Entry is free to all readers.
